Pre-reqs: ISCI 360.
ISCI 361 is a field course held in Hawaii during reading week. Students are registered by Integrated Sciences. For more info e-mail intsci@science.ubc.ca
courseName: Field Course: Systems Approaches to Regional Sustainability
description: Systems science approaches encompassing geological, hydrological, ecological, atmospheric sciences, and energy systems to investigate a selected region of the world. Course location will vary; fee payable prior to field course.
